Module com.game.comp2042_cw_hcyot1
Package com.game.comp2042_cw_hcyot1.painter

Class BasicPainter

java.lang.Object
com.game.comp2042_cw_hcyot1.painter.BasicPainter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Painter
public class BasicPainter extends Object implements Painter
This class contains many simple drawing methods used by GameView. It is an implementation of the interface Painter.
